shapes3d.animation
Class Camera

java.lang.Object
  shapes3d.animation.Camera
Direct Known Subclasses:
OrbitCam, VCam
public abstract class Camera
extends Object

Base class for all camera types provided by Shapes3D

Peter Lager

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

Camera

public Camera(PApplet app)
Creates a perspective camera. The default values are:
perspective(fov, aspectRatio, nearZ, farZ)
fov = PI/3
aspectRatio = width/height
nearZ = cameraZ / 10.0f
farZ = cameraZ*10.0f
where cameraZ is ((height/2.0) / tan(fov/2.0))

Parameters:
app -
